1352670.name: Kid Meat
1352670.description:
Kid Meat is a fast-paced action platformer on various locations with unique dynamic asymmetric multiplayer! Tag with ball, collect candies, avoid the traps and trap others - try to die less and score more to win!

Join our Discord Community!

Key Features:

  • Fun and easy to learn gameplay
  • Online and local multiplayer up to 4
  • Optional AI in online and local games
  • 5 unique customizable characters
  • 5 locations with unique visual style and level interactions [in development]
  • 10+ unique levels [in development]
  • 4 different game modes
  • Customizable rule sets
  • Level editor
  • In-game library of user generated content with rating system
  • Gamepad support
  • Low system requirements

Level Editor:

  • Powerful and easy to use editor tools
  • Huge library of blocks and decorative items
  • Color tinting
  • Game modes customization
  • Access to in-built levels to modify
  • Easy share and play
